Well they are Maximals, so they would be able to come in, since they are on
the same team, and my group never attacked the base, that was Wrath and
Kamodia, and Plintissa is disregarding them as Maximals now, let alone the
People's Group, and The Peopel's Group came back to the Maximla base to get
their orders from Liono, Plintissa will follow the orders out if she deems
them not a waste of her time, so get off my back, it wasn't my characters so
my characters are okay to come into the base...
